Koneksi Internet Telkomsel Terganggu, Ini Penjelasannya
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Ilustrasi. Foto: Unspslah

Jakarta - Sebagian netizen mengeluhkan layanan internet Telkomsel mengalami gangguan. Topik Telkomsel pun merangsek ke papan atas trending topic di Twitter."Please fix your internet connection ASAP @Telkomsel," tulis seorang netizen. "Telkomsel beneran gangguan. Cari cari di twitter, eh nemu katanya pake vpn. Baru lancar jaya," sebut yang lain."Kirain kuota ku yang habis, sampe gw restart ni hp, pas di jalan tadi gw nyari toko pake maps, akhirnya tersesat, oh telkomsel selalu di hati," tulis komentar berikutnya.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Telkomsel membenarkan sempat terjadi gangguan layanan. Akan tetapi setelah dilakukan perbaikan, layanan mereka mulai berangsur normal."Telah terjadi penurunan kualitas layanan data internet yang disebabkan oleh gangguan pada akses internet international Telkom Group, sedangkan untuk layanan voice dan SMS tetap berjalan normal," demikian keterangan dari Aldin Hasyim, GM External Corporate Communications Telkomsel"Saat ini layanan internet mulai berangsur pulih dan kami terus mengupayakan agar layanan internet dapat kembali normal. Kami menyampaikan permohonan maaf atas ketidaknyamanan yang terjadi," tambahnya."Telkomsel akan senantiasa berkomitmen untuk memberikan pelayanan terbaik bagi seluruh pelanggannya," pungkas Aldin.Simak Video "Ini Penjelasan soal Gangguan Jaringan Internet Telkomsel"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fyk/fay)

Telkomsel's Internet Connection Interrupted, Here's the Explanation
05 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Fino Yurio Kristo - detikInet


Illustration. Photo: Unspslah

Jakarta - Some netizens complained that Telkomsel's internet service had been interrupted. Telkomsel's topic was pushed to the top of the trending topic on Twitter. "Please fix your internet connection ASAP @ Telkomsel," wrote a netizen. "Telkomsel is really a nuisance. Search it on Twitter, I found it using vpn. It just went smoothly," said another. "Because my quota is exhausted, until I restart the cellphone, right on the road I was looking for a store using maps, finally got lost , oh Telkomsel is always at heart, "wrote the next comment. When confirmed, Telkomsel confirmed there had been a disruption in service. However, after improvements were made, their services began to return to normal. "There has been a decline in the quality of internet data services caused by disruptions in Telkom Group's international internet access, while voice and SMS services have remained normal," said information from Aldin Hasyim, GM External Telkomsel Corporate Communications "At present the internet service is gradually recovering and we continue to strive for internet services to return to normal. We apologize for the inconvenience," he added. "Telkomsel will always be committed to providing the best service for all its customers," concluded Aldin Video Watch "This Explanation about Telkomsel Internet Network Disruption" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (fyk / fay)
